title: Blind Melon, 2008 - For My Friends [@vbrbcn]
description:
For My Friends will be in stores on April 22 but will probably be available at the Blind Melon shows in early April.
The boy on the cover is Adrienne and Logan?s son, both are Travis long time friends. Adrienne saw Blind Melon in October 1995, a few days before Shannon died. Her son was born a few months later and was named after Shannon Hoon.

The album will also feature a duet with Travis? mother, Tennessee Tuckness on the song Cheetum Street. Tenneesee will be opening for Blind Melon in Dallas, TX.

Blind Melon - 2008 - For My Friends

1. For My Friends
2. Wishing Well
3. Make A Difference
4. Sometimes
5. Tumblin Down
6. With The Right Set Of Eyes
7. Harmful Belly
8. Father Time
9. Last Laugh
10. Down On The Pharmacy
11. Hypnotize
12. So High
13. Cheatem Street
